articles.title: NLB turns the page on reading with AR-powered specs
articles.description: Bookworms in Singapore may soon find their favourite stories leaping off the page literally as the National Library Board (NLB) teams up with Snap and agency LePub Singapore to pilot a new immersive storytelling experience using augmented reality (AR).

articles.title: BMW M2 CS packs an M4 punch for less money
articles.description: The new BMW M2 CS has figures which rival or match its bigger siblings, but it’s cheaper and even more raw.

articles.title: Everyone's looking to get in on vibe coding - and Google is no different with Stitch, its follow-up to Jules
articles.description: Google is looking to compete in vibe coding with Stitch, which designs user interfaces (UIs) with one prompt.

articles.title: 2025 BMW M2 CS to cost more than M3 in Australia
articles.description: Full Australian pricing and specs have been announced for the hottest version of BMW’s ‘junior’ coupe yet – and it won’t come cheap.

articles.title: Spott’s AI-native recruiting platform scores $3.2M to end hiring software chaos
articles.description: Spott secures $3.2 million in funding to build an all-in-one AI-native recruitment platform that automates workflows and eliminates tech fragmentation for recruitment agencies seeking to focus on high-value activities.

articles.title: Paper Moose Unveils New Agency Positioning, ‘Wildly Effective’
articles.description: Little Black Book, The articulation of the indie agency’s ambition follows the launch of Moose Review, a proprietary AI pre-testing platform

articles.title: PS Store Days of Play Sale Is Live Now with 1,300+ PS5, PS4 Game Discounts
articles.description: Forza! Indiana! Astro Bot! Kingdom Come! - Sony has set its digital PS Store sale as part of the annual Days of Play promotion live, bringing over 1,300 PS5,...

articles.title: Report: Apple to Add Dedicated Video Game App to Devices
articles.description: Apple plans to add a dedicated app for video games to its devices in the next versions of its operating systems.

articles.title: The HP Omen 17" RTX 4070 Gaming Laptop Drops to Only $1,199.99 With a 20% Off Code
articles.description: Get great mobile gaming performance without paying a markup.

articles.title: Apple to debut dedicated gaming app within days of Switch 2’s arrival
articles.description: [LOS ANGELES] Apple is planning a dedicated app for video games on its devices, seeking to sell gamers and developers on the idea that it’s a leader in the market.
